description.DownloadSong: Download current song as MP3. You can also use the Download Button on the player.
description.CustomBackground: Change the Background! Leave clear to use default of theme.
description.DJETA: Estimated wait time, updates after every song.
description.AFKAutoresponse: Automaticaly respond to messages after you were afk for x amount of Time.
description.CustomMention/NotificationSound: Only works with the Chrome Extensions because of UserScript restrictions! Just paste in a URL to a MP3!

description.1stinthequeue: Get a notification if you're the 1st in the queue!
description.Someonementionsyou: Get a notification if someone mentions you in chat!
description.NextSong: Get a notification everytime a new Song starts!
